info.brief_description: Master Roshi decides to pull out the micro band to spy on DB girls.
info.description:
Master Roshi was tired of having all these beautiful women around him only to have them show off their bodies and get nothing out of it. He finally decided he was gonna go out and live out his fantasies one way or another. He still had that microband Bulma gave him all those years ago and figured that would be the best way to go about things. He also couldn't just let those years go by that the women were in their primes, so he went to Bulma's house and snuck his way to the time machine Bulma had laying around. Even though Beerus destroyed it, Bulma made another one in secret, but hadn't put up any security around it yet. Once Roshi was at the machine he climbed into it and flew it back to kame island with no one suspecting a thing. Now he's just got to figure out where he wants to go...

This takes place after the tournament of power.

People are encouraged to add to the story.

Master Roshi can shrink the time machine, so nobody can find it.

Try to keep it unaware, but there is no penalty for making aware.

Rules:
1. No death
2. No Male perversions
3. He can have the option to grow and get personal with lady parts, just don't let it be him just walking over to someone and not using the shrink device to get to who he wants at all.
4. Keep an option where it stays unaware. (There can be aware content, but don't just ditch an unaware story.)
